info.author: Goetz Pfeiffer
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description: hg-diff is a simple GUI program to browse mercurial revisions. It is used to display a summary of all changes between two revisions and to display a graphical comparison of the two versions of each changed file.
info.keywords: Version Control, mercurial, GUI, revision browser, diff
info.license: GNU GPL version 3 or later, see file LICENSE
info.name: hg-diff
info.summary: a simple GUI browser for mercurial revisions
info.html_description: hg-diff is a simple GUI program to browse mercurial revisions. It is used to display a summary of all changes between two revisions and to display a graphical comparison of the two versions of each changed file.
